<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Event Handlers
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds an event handler to the given display. Returns the ID of the event handler, or -1 when failed.
<br>
Returning [[true]] in EH code will override default engine handling for keyboard events.
<br>
See [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers|User Interface Event Handlers]] for the full list of event names.
<br>
If applicable, see [[DIK_KeyCodes]] for a list of key code constants, which are relevant to key related user interface events like: [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers#onKeyDown|KeyDown]] & [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers#onKeyUp|KeyUp]].<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title> Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Display EHs are processed in reversed order, i.e. last added: first, first added: last. So if you have an override it should be set up in the 1st added EH.</value></part></template>
<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>When using the event names listed [[User Interface Event Handlers|here]] with the [[ctrlAddEventHandler]], [[ctrlSetEventHandler]], [[displayAddEventHandler]] or [[displaySetEventHandler]] commands, the prefix "on" in the event name must be removed (e.g. ''''ButtonDown'''' instead of ''''onButtonDown'''').</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> display '''displayAddEventHandler''' [eventName, code]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display: [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [eventName, code]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> eventName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> code: [[String]] or [[Code]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>moduleName_keyDownEHId <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayAddEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", "[[hint]] [[str]] _this;"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>moduleName_keyDownEHId <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayAddEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", {[[hint]] [[str]] _this}];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ListOfKeyCodes]], [[disableSerialization]], [[displayRemoveAllEventHandlers]], [[displayRemoveEventHandler]], [[displaySetEventHandler]], [[ctrlAddEventHandler]], [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers|UI Event Handlers]], [[findDisplay]], [[DIK_KeyCodes|DIK KeyCodes]], [[keyName]]
</value></part></template>
